analysis.description:
FOIChainCrowdsale._forwardFunds (/unique_chucks/33/0x673827c4349cbfaef965d2ed555c4b1331087235.sol) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- wallet.transfer(address(this).balance) (/unique_chucks/33/0x673827c4349cbfaef965d2ed555c4b1331087235.sol)
Crowdsale.rate (/unique_chucks/33/0x673827c4349cbfaef965d2ed555c4b1331087235.sol#438-442) is never initialized. It is used in:

CappedTokenCrowdsale.tokensSold (/unique_chucks/33/0x673827c4349cbfaef965d2ed555c4b1331087235.sol#777-779) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- tokenCapReached (/unique_chucks/33/0x673827c4349cbfaef965d2ed555c4b1331087235.sol#792-795)
	- finalization (/unique_chucks/33/0x673827c4349cbfaef965d2ed555c4b1331087235.sol)
	- unsoldTokens (/unique_chucks/33/0x673827c4349cbfaef965d2ed555c4b1331087235.sol#969-975)

Reentrancy in FOIChainCrowdsale._processPurchase (/unique_chucks/33/0x673827c4349cbfaef965d2ed555c4b1331087235.sol#1002-1016):
	External calls:
	- super._processPurchase(_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/33/0x673827c4349cbfaef965d2ed555c4b1331087235.sol#1003)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/33/0x673827c4349cbfaef965d2ed555c4b1331087235.sol#1008-1010)

Reentrancy in FOIChainCrowdsale.updateTokenAddress (/unique_chucks/33/0x673827c4349cbfaef965d2ed555c4b1331087235.sol#913-919):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(_token.owner() == address(this)) (/unique_chucks/33/0x673827c4349cbfaef965d2ed555c4b1331087235.sol#918)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- token (/unique_chucks/33/0x673827c4349cbfaef965d2ed555c4b1331087235.sol#918)

TimedCrowdsale.constructor (/unique_chucks/33/0x673827c4349cbfaef965d2ed555c4b1331087235.sol#627-638) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_openingTime >= block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/33/0x673827c4349cbfaef965d2ed555c4b1331087235.sol#629-631)

TimedCrowdsale.hasClosed (/unique_chucks/33/0x673827c4349cbfaef965d2ed555c4b1331087235.sol#645-651) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > closingTime (/unique_chucks/33/0x673827c4349cbfaef965d2ed555c4b1331087235.sol#648-651)
Crowdsale.rate should be constant (/unique_chucks/33/0x673827c4349cbfaef965d2ed555c4b1331087235.sol#438-442)
Ownable.renounceOwnership (/unique_chucks/33/0x673827c4349cbfaef965d2ed555c4b1331087235.sol#40-46) should be declared external
